abstract: Italian court refuses to indict Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi in tax fraud and embezzlement case involving his family's media company Mediaset.
snippet: The case focused on the acquisition of TV rights by Mediaset, the company owned by Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s family.
lead_paragraph: The case focused on the acquisition of TV rights by Mediaset, the company owned by Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s family.

headline.main: Court Refuses to Indict Berlusconi in Tax Fraud Case
headline.seo: Court Refuses to Indict Berlusconi in Tax Fraud Case
